sectionSubtitle: Insights and experiences in quantum computing and machine learning

posts.title: QGANs for Monte Carlo Simulations in High-Energy Physics
posts.description: Exploring the implementation of Quantum Generative Adversarial Networks for Monte Carlo simulations in particle physics. A deep dive into my Google Summer of Code 2024 project with ML4SCI, focusing on quantum approaches to particle simulation.

posts.title: Understanding Gradient Descent Optimizers
posts.description: A comprehensive review of commonly used gradient descent optimization algorithms in deep learning. Examining the mechanics and applications of various optimizers including SGD, Adam, and RMSprop, with practical insights for implementation.

posts.title: Quantum Sudoku Solver with NISQ Devices
posts.description: Exploring the implementation and optimization of a quantum algorithm for solving 9x9 Sudoku puzzles on current quantum hardware. A detailed look at circuit optimization techniques and the challenges of working with NISQ devices.
